summary: The Q1 project timeline has been updated due to a client request for the initial prototype delivery by March 10. Design must finalize assets by March 5, and engineering should focus on API integration this week, with progress to be reviewed in Friday's sync.
key_points: Client requested prototype delivery by March 10.
Design needs to finalize assets by March 5.
Engineering should prioritize API integration this week.
Progress will be reviewed in Friday's sync.
